definition: A period of time in an individual's life characterized by specific experiences, circumstances, and developmental changes. It is commonly used to refer to distinct stages or phases that people go through, such as childhood, adolescence, adulthood, or old age.

examples.german: Die Kindheit ist eine wichtige Lebensphase.
examples.english: Childhood is an important phase of life.

examples.german: Die Pubert√§t ist eine schwierige Lebensphase.
examples.english: Puberty is a challenging phase of life.

examples.german: Die berufliche Karriere beginnt in der jungen Erwachsenenphase.
examples.english: The professional career starts in the young adult phase.

examples.german: Die Elternschaft ist eine neue Lebensphase.
examples.english: Parenthood is a new phase of life.

examples.german: Die Rente markiert den Beginn der Ruhestandsphase.
examples.english: Retirement marks the beginning of the retirement phase.
